name: sleazy

morally bad and low in quality, but trying to attract people by a showy appearance or false manner: He’s a sleazy politician who ignored his responsibilities in order to make his friends rich.

sleazy people and places are involved in activities of a low moral standard: 57% of voters think of the government as "sleazy and incompetent". He spent his twenties hanging out in sleazy sex bars.
sleazy behaviour is of a low moral standard: I was disgusted by the sleazy sales tactics.
